Package org.cooperari.feature.monitor

Yield point support for Java monitor operations and related deadlock detection.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CMonitorFeature
    Handler for monitor yield points.
    DeadlockDetector
    Monitor acquisition deadlock detector.
    Enter
    Monitor enter operation (lock acquisition).
    Exit
    Monitor exit operation (lock release).
    Monitor
    Representation of a monitor.
    MonitorOperation<T>
    Base class for monitor operations.
    MonitorPool
    Runtime pool for Monitor objects.
    Notify
    Operation for Object.notify().
    NotifyAll
    Operation for Object.notifyAll().
    ThreadHoldsLock
    Operation for Thread.holdsLock().
    Wait
    Operations for Object.wait().
    YieldPoints
    AspectJ instrumentation for monitor operations.
  • Error Summary 
    Error Description
    CResourceDeadlockError
    Exception thrown due to a deadlock error.

Package org.cooperari.feature.monitor Description

Yield point support for Java monitor operations and related deadlock detection.
